channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Investment Manager Selection Is Hotting Up. Are You Ready for the Tough Questions?
item.description: Investment managers are being caught off guard by tougher questions from an increasingly sophisticated allocator market. Are you prepared for your next beauty parade?

item.title: Specialists in relocating Americans to Europe and Canada are seeing the phone ringing off the hook since the Trump vs Biden debate
item.description: "If you're no longer working and you could choose to live anywhere in the world, why would you choose to live in the U.S. now?"

item.title: Measuring Corporate Impact: The Gold Is in the Details
item.description: Do the products and services of the companies you invest in create negative or positive material outcomes?

item.title: New Yorkers immediately protest new AI-based weapons detectors on subways
item.description: “It’s not going to work," said Dre Thomas, 25, shaking his head at the device.

item.title: Is Widespread Crypto Adoption Inevitable?
item.description: New technologies always face resistance, but demographic shifts imply there is a fierce tailwind behind crypto adoption, politically, economically, and financially.

item.title: General Motors, Honda, and Hyundai are accused of inappropriately selling customer data
item.description: Verisk used the data to prepare reports on driving-behavior history and sold them to insurance companies, two senators alleged.

item.title: Book Review: Shocks, Crises, and False Alarms
item.description: Carlsson-Szlezak and Swartz attempt to add fresh thinking on framing macro shocks that may often prove to be false alarms. Any general reader will obtain some key fresh insights with this work, and CFA charterholders will be offered an alternative to the conventional Wall Street approach to macro discussions.

item.title: Mass exodus in Mexico after cartel violence intensifies
item.description: Two of Mexico’s most powerful cartels from the northern states of Sinaloa and Jalisco have been battling for control of smuggling routes.

item.title: Preserving the Dollar: The Role of CBDCs in Securing Economic Stability for Future Generations
item.description: As financial systems evolve, preserving the US dollar's dominance will require skillful policy management and the integration of cutting-edge technologies.

item.title: A 59-year-old widow has been forced to use a breathing tube and skyrocketing demand for wood pellets in the EU might be to blame
item.description: Wood pellet production is feeding demand for renewable energy in the EU, but it's taking a toll on Americans' health.
